resources.string: Welcome to Guarne town, eastern gate Antioqueño

Distance 24km East of Medellin 
 Altitude 2150 meters 
 151km² Area 
Population 38.847hab 
Temperature 18 °C

Made by Jonathan Duque Gallego
Electronics Engineering Estudent 
 University of Antioquia
Crystalline water fountain in via the Brizuela, ideal for a good splash of cold water
Nice place in the town of La Honda, for camping and take a dip in cool water
Site of tourism and religious pilgrimage, especially the first Saturday of each month
Modern sports complex, which has synthetic soccer field, tennis and sport shooting rink and road racing.
Traditional village park where you will find all kinds of places to enjoy a good time
